Header: Muslim Religious ceremony held in memory of bomb victims
Content: A religious program in memory of those who died in the Easter Sunday terrorist attack and wishing for a speedy recovery of those who were injured, took place at the Independence Square in Colombo. The religious program has been organized by the Sri Lanka Muslim Civil Organizations collectively. A silence of two minutes was observed in remembrance of those who died in the terrorist attacks. All religious leaders, public representatives and security authorities were present on the occasion.
